scripts.copy: shx rm -rf ./backend/build && shx mkdir -p ./backend/build && shx cp -r ./frontend/build/* ./backend/build/
scripts.build:dev: cd ./frontend && env-cmd -f ../.env.development npm run build && cd .. &&  npm run copy
scripts.build:prod: cd ./frontend && env-cmd -f ../.env.prod npm run build && cd .. &&  npm run copy
scripts.postinstall: (cd frontend && npm install); (cd backend && npm install);
